IMF’s Zhang: Vaccine policy is the most powerful weapon in the fight against the pandemic. We need to give everyone a fair shot by ensuring access to COVID-19 vaccines for people everywhere. Read his speech at the 2021 UN #ECOSOC Forum: https://t.co/sfIx3jn3lD

In the short to medium term, vaccine policy is economic policy. Speeding access to vaccines can boost global GDP by 1 percentage point. Check out our latest projections for the global economy. https://t.co/hcZ4l9uUWv #WEO https://t.co/OQA2q56smN
